main event: Civilians observed an unidentified object hovering over Rome, New York on December 4, 1953.
interesting points: The object was oval-shaped and emitted a pale blue-green light., It was seen by 3 people between 8:00 PM and 8:45 PM., The object hovered for approximately 30-45 minutes., The object accelerated away at high speed without making any sound., Local astronomer concluded that a meteor was the explanation for other recent sightings in the area.
sighted object: oval-shaped object emitting pale blue-green light
